description.brief: Googletest unit testing framework for C++

package.description: google-test contains the googletest framework for C++, by Google. gtest is the standard unit test library for ROS code written in C++, including roscpp and, as such, is included within the ROS distribution. This package wraps version 1.0.1. Our intent is to migrate to OS package manager distributions as this library becomes more widely available.
package.author: Google
